Hi gang. I am beginning a massive paper on Yamada Nagamasa, an 
adventurer-merchant (and warrior) who lived and fought in Siam in the 
early 17th.c. (his dates are ?-1630)
I found most of my sources in books related to Siamese History, but I 
was wondering if you have any information on him, the Japanese in 
Ayutthaya, and eventually other Japanese who lived in Southeast asia 
(Hue, Manila, etc.) in this period.
If you can refer to any book or journal, that might really help. 
material in japanese language is ok too.
Thanks a lot!!
Cepo, Honolulu
